translations.text: What are they asking one another about?
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: But no! They will come to know.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Again, no! They will come to know.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Have We not smoothed out the earth ˹like a bed˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and ˹made˺ the mountains as ˹its˺ pegs,<sup foot_note=77582>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and made your sleep for rest,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and made the night as a cover,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and made the day for livelihood,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and built above you seven mighty ˹heavens˺,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and placed ˹in them˺ a shining lamp,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and sent down from rainclouds pouring water,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: producing by it grain and ˹various˺ plants,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, the Day of ˹Final˺ Decision is an appointed time—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِى ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا

translations.text: ˹it is˺ the Day the Trumpet will be blown, and you will ˹all˺ come forth in crowds.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: The sky will be ˹split˺ open, becoming ˹many˺ gates,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and the mountains will be blown away, becoming ˹like˺ a mirage.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, Hell is lying in ambush
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: as a home for the transgressors,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: where they will remain for ˹endless˺ ages.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا

translations.text: There they will not taste any coolness or drink,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: For they never expected any reckoning,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: And We have everything recorded precisely.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: ˹So the deniers will be told,˺ “Taste ˹the punishment˺, for all you will get from Us is more torment.”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: Indeed, the righteous will have salvation—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: and full-bosomed maidens of equal age,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration
Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّٰبًا

translations.text: never to hear any idle talk or lying therein—
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

translations.text: a ˹fitting˺ reward as a generous gift from your Lord,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran
Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: رَّبِّ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا

translations.text: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and everything in between, the Most Compassionate. No one will dare speak to Him
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Rabbi assamawati wal-ardiwama baynahuma arrahmani layamlikoona minhu khitaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ ٱلرُّوحُ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا

translations.text: on the Day the ˹holy˺ spirit<sup foot_note=77583>1</sup> and the angels will stand in ranks. None will talk, except those granted permission by the Most Compassionate and whose words are true.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Yawma yaqoomu arroohu walmala-ikatusaffan la yatakallamoona illa man athinalahu arrahmanu waqala sawaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْيَوْمُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

translations.text: That Day is the ˹ultimate˺ truth. So let whoever wills take the path leading back to their Lord.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Thalika alyawmu alhaqqu famanshaa ittakhatha ila rabbihi maaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: إِنَّآ أَنذَرْنَـٰكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ ٱلْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ ٱلْكَافِرُ يَـٰلَيْتَنِى كُنتُ تُرَٰبًۢا

translations.text: Indeed, We have warned you of an imminent punishment—the Day every person will see ˹the consequences of˺ what their hands have done, and the disbelievers will cry, “I wish I were dust.”<sup foot_note=77584>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Inna antharnakum AAathabanqareeban yawma yanthuru almaro ma qaddamatyadahu wayaqoolu alkafiru ya laytanee kuntuturaba
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
